about_the_game:
In the critical moment of the battle against the Demon King, the space around Luo Wenhao and Lin Youyue suddenly twisted. The space rippled like waves, forming cracks that instantly swallowed them, throwing them back in time to a thousand years ago on the continent of Eusia.
Luo Wenhao and Lin Youyue found themselves in a peaceful border town of the Kingdom of Tirastria. The locals were unaware of their arrival, continuing their lives in tranquility. These two people from the future begin their new adventure in a different world’s past.



A thousand years ago on the continent of Eusia, vast lands were connected through thriving sea and air trade routes that fueled the prosperity of various nations. Merchants preferred the economical sea routes, while airships, despite offering quick and convenient transportation, were still limited in use. In this game, players can freely move across the overworld map, exploring towns, hidden dungeons, and more. The choice of trade and transportation routes will directly impact the player’s strategy and adventure.



The expansion of the Saharu Kingdom, coupled with the resurgence of the Demon King, completely altered the fate of the continent of Eusia. Adventurers emerged like stars: from the steadfast generals, to stealthy ninjas operating in the shadows, and elegant dancers with graceful moves… Over forty characters will make their debut. Join forces with them, alter the course of the continent’s destiny, delve into their backstories, and train them to become legendary heroes capable of turning the tide of battle.



Building on the combat system of the previous installment, we have upgraded the battlefield from a grid-like view to a fully immersive full-screen experience. Now, you can control cavalry, archers, and mysterious ninjas, leading them across the battlefield! Through clever command and diverse skill combinations, wage war across the land, conquer enemy territories, and strive to become the most powerful knight on the continent of Eusia!



This game features approximately 27 main storyline battles, as well as several side missions, each filled with challenges and strategic depth. You’ll break through fog-covered forests, endure battles in torrential rain, fight against the cold in snow-covered plateaus, push forward through lava-filled underworlds, or outmaneuver your enemies in endless deserts. Each level incorporates unique strategic elements, testing your wisdom and tactics, offering an unparalleled strategic experience. Embark on this grand adventure and conquer every battlefield across the continent of Eusia!
